part.Name: Description
part.Short: You nearly mistake =pronouns.objective= for the rock on which =pronouns.subjective= =verb:perch:afterpronoun=. =pronouns.Possessive= stony feathers provide both excellent protection from the elements and a suprisingly effective camouflage. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:glare:afterpronoun= down at the world below as =pronouns.possessive= talons scratch deep gouges where =pronouns.subjective= =verb:sit:afterpronoun=.
